titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation, prohibiting all unlawful and seditious meetings and conventicles under pretence of religious worship.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, 1660. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the tenth day of January, one thousand six hundred and sixty, in the twelfth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
